item.title: 从长远来看，我们都是修订版预测
item.description:
一年一度的发布下一年度预测并将其拆解的仪式正在进行中。然后是长期预测。【原文：

The annual ritual of publishing next-year forecasts and then tearing them apart is underway. And then there’s the long term.

】

item.title: 如何让英国再次繁荣
item.description:
经济学家萨姆-鲍曼（Sam Bowman）做客《Merryn Talks Money》节目，解释英国经济停滞不前的原因，以及英国如何才能启动经济增长。【原文：

Economist Sam Bowman joins Merryn Talks Money to explain why the UK has stagnated and what it can do to kickstart growth.

】

item.title: 迫在眉睫的金融困境为罗马尼亚大选蒙上阴影
item.description:
在经历了国家经济的黄金时代之后，增税和削减开支的前景成为竞选活动的主要议题。【原文：

After a golden era for the country’s economy, the prospect of tax increases and spending cuts is dominating the campaign.

】

item.title: 受能源制裁影响，俄罗斯大型液化天然气建设设施灯光暗淡
item.description: 俄罗斯唯一的液化天然气模块建造场的活动似乎有所下滑，这再次表明西方的制裁正在挫败俄罗斯在这一关键能源市场上崭露头角的雄心。【原文：Activity appears to have slumped at Russia’s only construction yard for liquefied natural gas modules, another sign of how Western sanctions are thwarting the country’s ambition to become a top player in this key energy market.】

item.title: 汽油价格飙升后，尼日利亚人开始将汽车改用压缩天然气
item.description: 在尼日利亚各地的加油站，汽车大排长龙是常见的景象，但对于一些转向使用压缩天然气的司机来说，加油泵正在成为过去。【原文：Long queues of cars are a common sight at petrol stations across Nigeria, but for some drivers turning to compressed natural gas, pumps are becoming a thing of the past.】

item.title: 菲律宾中央银行称美元走强导致菲律宾比索疲软
item.description: 在菲律宾比索跌至历史最低点一天后，菲律宾中央银行表示，菲律宾比索的疲软是由美元走强造成的。【原文：The weakness in the Philippine peso is caused by a strong dollar, the central bank said, a day after the local currency fell to a record low.】

item.title: 乐天化学债权人会议聚焦韩国风险
item.description: 乐天化学（Lotte Chemical）出人意料地召开债权人会议，以取消其债券契约中的一项条款，这使投资者对韩国利率敏感行业所面临的风险更加关注。【原文：Lotte Chemical’s surprise move to call a creditors meeting to remove a clause in its bonds covenant is bringing into sharp focus the risks investors face from exposure to interest rates sensitive industries in South Korea.】

item.title: 欧洲基准价格上涨，亚洲液化天然气跃升至今年最高点
item.description: 由于来自欧洲的供暖和发电厂燃料竞争加剧，北亚现货液化天然气价格跃升至今年最高水平。【原文：North Asia spot liquefied natural gas prices jumped to the highest level this year on increased competition from Europe for the heating and power plant fuel.】

item.title: 西澳大利亚小麦收成意外丰收
item.description: 西澳大利亚州的小麦有望获得意外丰收，尽管本季早些时候的降雨量较低，预计会抑制产量。【原文：Western Australia is on track for a surprise bumper wheat crop, despite low rainfall earlier in the season that had been expected to crimp output.】

item.title: 阿达尼股价因美国指控暴跌 270 亿美元后跌幅扩大
item.description: 阿达尼集团公司的股票周五多数走低，延续了因美国检察官指控高塔姆-阿达尼行贿而引发的大跌。【原文：Shares of Adani Group companies traded mostly lower on Friday, extending a selloff driven by US prosecutors’ charges of bribery against Gautam Adani.】

item.title: 新西兰央行下调利率，猕猴桃兑澳元跌至两年低点
item.description: 新西兰元兑澳大利亚元汇率跌至两年来的最低点，原因是人们越来越多地猜测新西兰央行将在下周把官方现金利率下调半个百分点以上。【原文：New Zealand’s dollar dropped to a two-year low against its Australian counterpart on rising speculation the former’s central bank will cut the official cash rate by more than half a percentage point next week.】

item.title: 阿达尼案调查令投资者面临更多印度挑战，绿色能源股飘红
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 经济放缓，国家银行的对冲措施限制了印度的借贷成本
item.description: 印度最年轻的基础设施贷款公司加大了利率衍生品市场的套期保值力度，从而帮助抑制了该国的融资成本，这对经济放缓的印度来说是一个意外之喜。【原文：India’s youngest infrastructure lender has increased hedging in the interest-rate derivatives market to such an extent that it’s helping keep a lid on funding costs in the country, an unintended benefit to a slowing economy.】

item.title: 债券持有人反对后，DirecTV 将取消对 Dish 的收购
item.description: 据一位熟悉 DirecTV 计划的人士透露，在 Dish 母公司未能获得债券持有人对债务交换的同意后，DirecTV 打算取消对竞争对手卫星电视服务公司 Dish Network Corp. 的收购计划。【原文：DirecTV intends to call off its planned acquisition of rival satellite TV service Dish Network Corp. after Dish’s parent failed to win the consent of bondholders for a debt exchange, according to a person familiar with the company’s plans.】

item.title: 阿达尼贿赂指控加剧了魁北克养老金在印度的噩梦
item.description: 美国对印度亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）的贿赂指控使加拿大最大的公共养老金管理公司之一陷入困境，加深了该公司在可再生能源投资失败后的尴尬。【原文：US bribery charges against Indian billionaire Gautam Adani have ensnared one of Canada’s largest public pension managers, deepening its embarrassment over a renewable-energy investment that went sour.】

item.title: 日本能否再次成为世界科技巨头？
item.description:
在彭博社原创系列Momentum的这一集中，Haslinda Amin揭示了原始芯片巨头 是如何重新启动的。【原文：

On this episode of the Bloomberg Originals series Momentum, Haslinda Amin reveals how the original chip powerhouse is rebooting.

】

item.title: 货币交易员押注特朗普上台后市场波动性将卷土重来
item.description: 货币交易商们打赌，唐纳德-特朗普的施政纲领即将引发每天7.5万亿美元外汇市场的波动。【原文：Currency traders are betting that Donald Trump’s policy agenda is about to jumpstart volatility in the $7.5 trillion-a-day foreign exchange market.】

item.title: 美团、周大福财报将为中国消费者情绪提供线索
item.description: 美团和周大福珠宝集团有限公司的财报将揭示中国消费市场的发展态势，经济复苏缓慢、房地产困境持续、就业环境不稳定等因素将拖累中国消费市场。【原文：Meituan and Chow Tai Fook Jewellery Group Ltd.’s earnings should reveal how China’s consumer market is shaping up, with sentiment weighed down by a slow economic recovery, prolonged property woes and an unstable employment environment.】

item.title: 印度是阿布登明年在亚洲寻找承运商的最大赌注
item.description: 印度储备银行维护卢比的意愿使该国成为 abrdn plc 在亚洲的最大投注对象，因为预期保护利差收益将有助于该国资产跑赢大盘。【原文：The Reserve Bank of India’s willingness to defend the rupee makes the country abrdn plc’s top bet in Asia, on the expectation that protection of carry gains will help the country’s assets outperform.】

item.title: 日本经济刺激政策的总体影响将达 2500 亿美元
item.description: 日本首相石破茂表示，即将出台的经济刺激计划的总体影响将达到 39 万亿日元（合 2,500 亿美元），这一数字通常包括私营部门的支出。【原文：Japan’s Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba said that the overall impact from the upcoming stimulus package will be ¥39 trillion ($250 billion), a figure that usually includes spending from the private sector.】

item.title: 阿达尼案调查可能加剧全球基金退出印度股市的趋势
item.description: 美国检察官对印度最大的企业集团提出了前所未有的贿赂指控，这有可能加深全球资金从印度股票市场的外流。【原文：An unprecedented bribery charge from US prosecutors against India’s largest corporate group is threatening to deepen the record exodus of global funds from the nation’s equities.】

item.title: 印尼埃拉美公司称抑制镍供应以支持当地企业
item.description: 据 Eramet SA 公司称，由于电池金属市场长期低迷，印尼正在挤压镍矿石供应，以保护当地较小的矿商。【原文：Indonesia is squeezing supplies of nickel ore to protect smaller local miners as the market for the battery metal endures a prolonged slump, according to Eramet SA.】

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司到 2029 年将支付高达 550 亿美元的红利
item.description: 巴西石油公司（Petroleo Brasileiro SA）计划在 2029 年前支付多达 550 亿美元的股息，作为其五年业务计划的一部分，承诺继续向投资者返还现金。【原文：Petroleo Brasileiro SA plans to pay as much as $55 billion in dividends through 2029 as part of its five-year business plan in a pledge to continue returning cash to investors.】

item.title: 黄金因避险需求和美联储鸽派言论而维持四日涨势
item.description: 在俄罗斯与乌克兰战争升级的背景下，避险需求增加了支撑，同时交易商评估了美联储进一步宽松政策的前景，因此黄金维持了连续四天的涨势。【原文：Gold held a four-day rally as haven demand added support amid an escalation in Russia’s war with Ukraine, while traders assessed prospects for further easing by the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: Stripe 以 700 亿美元估值要约收购股票
item.description: 私营金融科技巨头 Stripe 公司再次回购部分股票，估值约为 700 亿美元。【原文：Private fintech giant Stripe Inc. is again buying back some of its shares and at a roughly $70 billion valuation.】

item.title: 英国消费者信心随着预算阴霾的消散而回升
item.description: 一项调查显示，在预算案结束了工党新政府税收和支出计划的不确定性之后，11 月份英国消费者信心意外增长。【原文：UK consumer confidence posted a surprise increase in November after the budget ended uncertainty over the tax and spending plans of the new Labour government, a survey found.】

item.title: 新加坡强劲增长促使 2024 年预测升级
item.description: 由于经济复苏势头强劲，新加坡第三季度的经济扩张情况好于最初的预期，促使该城市国家上调了今年的经济增长预期。【原文：Singapore’s economic expansion fared better than initially expected in the third quarter, prompting the city-state to upgrade its growth forecast for this year as recovery gained momentum.】

item.title: 日本通胀率保持在日本央行目标之上，加息赌注依然存在
item.description: 尽管价格涨势略有放缓，但日本的关键通胀指标仍保持在央行目标之上，这些数据在很大程度上支持了央行关于潜在通胀依然稳健的观点。【原文：Japan’s key inflation gauge held above the central bank’s target even as price gains moderated a tad, in data largely supporting the central bank’s view that underlying inflation remains solid.】

item.title: 俄乌战争升级，石油有望每周上涨
item.description: 由于俄罗斯和乌克兰之间的敌对行动升级，石油创下 10 月初以来的最大单周涨幅。【原文：Oil headed for the biggest weekly gain since early October on an escalation of hostilities between Russia and Ukraine.】

item.title: 美国加密货币前景乐观，比特币濒临 100,000 美元
item.description: 比特币曾一度冲向 100,000 美元的标志性价位，这主要是受到对美国友好监管的预期以及当选总统唐纳德-特朗普对加密货币的支持所带来的投资者兴趣扩大的影响。【原文：Bitcoin flirted with a run toward the landmark $100,000 level, buoyed by expectations of friendly US regulations and expanding investor interest courtesy of President-elect Donald Trump’s support for crypto.】
